text: Fabio Coltorti (born 3 December 1980) is a former Swiss football player. He played as a goalkeeper. He has played for Kriens, Schaffhausen, Thun, Grasshoppers, Racing Santander, Lausanne-Sport, RB Leipzig and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss association football goalkeepers Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Lucerne
title: Fabio Coltorti
